common_0230_rival_00a:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Here we are, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]!
Welcome\r
to\r
Naranja Academy![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0230_rival_00b:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Here we are, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]!
Welcome\r
to\r
Uva Academy![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0230_rival_02:
You can sign up for all kinds of classes at the
desk behind me, and those halls off to the sides\r
lead to all different parts of the school.[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0230_rival_03:
It’s totally big enough to let loose and battle in
here, but for some reason, they banned Pokémon\r
battling in the main entrance...[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0230_head_teacher_02: How did you find your first school commute?[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0230_head_teacher_02a:
I imagine Miss Nemona’s high spirits helped with
that. She’s a true asset to our fine academy.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0230_head_teacher_02b:
Oh dear, was it really? I suppose Miss Nemona
must have led you on quite the adventure...[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0230_head_teacher_03:
Not that I was expecting any less from our
Champion-ranked student council president.\r
Reliable as ever, Miss Nemona.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0230_rival_04:
Well, I know how to look after my friends!
Right, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]?[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0230_rival_09:
Oh! But speaking of which...we saw some of
those Team Star kids in town, Director![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0230_rival_10:
It was down the stairs from the front gates. They
were hassling this kid with an Eevee backpack...[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0230_head_teacher_08:
That is quite the news. Are they still to be found
out there?[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0230_rival_11:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Actually, [VAR TRNAME(0000)] flexed
on ’em\r
and ran\r
’em off.[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0230_head_teacher_10:
Of course it’s a fine thing to try to help a fellow
student, M[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0305)]asteriss [VAR TRNAME(0000)]...\c
But you might wish to show a bit of restraint as
you find your feet here at our academy.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0230_head_teacher_11:
And, Miss Nemona, do remember that the
school’s staff is here to resolve any such troubles.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0230_head_teacher_12:
A child with an Eevee backpack, you say...
I suppose that might have been Miss Penny.\r
I’m relieved to hear she’s come to class, at least.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0230_head_teacher_04:
Ah, and Miss Nemona? If you’d be so good, do
report to Mr. Jacq about this Team Star business.\c
As your homeroom teacher, he should be kept
apprised of all such goings-on.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0230_head_teacher_05:
Ah, but look at the time. You two had better
hurry along—classes will be starting soon.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0230_rival_06:
[VAR BD06(0000)]We’re in class 1-A, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]!
C’mon,\r
I’ll\r
show\r
you\r
the way![VAR 0114(0004)]
